participant_1.background:
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.
I spend my days working on custom upholstery projects, coming up with new designs for my clothes, and playing board games with friends.
I love that I get to be around my pets all day.
i sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends.
i do not have children.

participant_2.background:
I need some time to myself.
my father recently had a heart attack.
I keep my mind active by learning new things and trying new challenges.
i make 30k a year.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

content.text: Hey!
Hey!
How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just got back from a doctor's appointment with my dad.
Oh no, what happened?
He had a heart attack last week, so I was just checking in with him.
That's scary! I'm glad he's okay.
Yeah, he's doing better. He's going to have to make some lifestyle changes, but he's on the mend.
That's great to hear! What kind of changes?
He's going to have to eat healthier and get more exercise.
That's good for him. I'm sure he'll be feeling better in no time.
Me too! Thanks for asking about him.
No problem! What's your favorite thing to do to keep your mind active?
I like to read and learn new things. I also like to take classes and try new things.
That's great! I like to read and learn new things too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I really like science fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love reading about different worlds and creatures.
Me too! It's so much fun to escape into a different reality for a while.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we have that in common.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about books.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too
